execCases.description: Test case for DELETE with ORDER BY and LIMIT

gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl1 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT)
CREATE TABLE tbl2 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, ref_id INT)
INSERT INTO tbl2 (name, age, ref_id) VALUES ('User1', 30, 1), ('User2', 29, 2), ('User3', 28, 3), ('User4', 27, 4)
DELETE FROM tbl1 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 2

masterCheckSQL.name: Check master after DELETE with ORDER BY and LIMIT
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE name IN ('User1', 'User2')

gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl1 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT)
CREATE TABLE tbl2 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, ref_id INT)
INSERT INTO tbl2 (name, age, ref_id) VALUES ('User1', 30, 1), ('User2', 29, 2), ('User3', 28, 3), ('User4', 27, 4)
DELETE tbl1, tbl2 FROM tbl1 INNER JOIN tbl2 ON tbl1.id = tbl2.id WHERE tbl1.age >=28

masterCheckSQL.name: Check master after multi-table DELETE for tbl1
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE name IN ('User3')

masterCheckSQL.name: Check master after multi-table DELETE for tbl2
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT * FROM tbl2 WHERE name IN ('User3')

execCases.description: Test case for multi-table DELETE using USING

gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl1 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT)
CREATE TABLE tbl2 (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, ref_id INT)
INSERT INTO tbl2 (name, age, ref_id) VALUES ('User1', 30, 1), ('User2', 29, 2), ('User3', 28, 3), ('User4', 27, 4)
DELETE FROM tbl1, tbl2 USING tbl1 INNER JOIN tbl2 ON tbl1.id = tbl2.id WHERE tbl2.age >= 26

masterCheckSQL.name: Check master after multi-table DELETE using USING for tbl1
Check master after multi-table DELETE using USING for tbl2
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT * FROM tbl2 WHERE name IN ('User4')
